annotations:
Dear all,
Good day.
Pls pps suitable biz for our below firm:
MV LILY RISING MES56 OPEN HALDIA ON ABT 28-1ST  OR PASSING SGP 2-6TH,SEP
BOD 950/80, PREFER TO CHINA
1)      28-35K
1 TCT WITH HARMLESS BULK DUR 20 DAYS WOG
DEL: TO MAKE MALSYSIA
RDL: CHINA
LAYCAN:8-10th ,SEP
COMM:3.75%
2)      SMX- UMX
1 TCT WITH HARMLESS BULK DUR12 DAYS WOG
DEL: TO MAKE SKALI
RDL: CHINA
LAYCAN:2-5TH,SEP
COMM:3.75%
3)      SMX- UMX
1 TCT WITH HARMLESS BULK DUR12 DAYS WOG
DEL: TO MAKE SKALI
RDL: CHINA
LAYCAN:9-11th,SEP
COMM:3.75%
4)      NEXT WCSA TO CHINA IRNO ORE
28-38K IRON ORE IN BULK
ILO,PERU/ DAFENG OR RIZHAO OR CJK OR SONGXIA,CHINA
8000/12000
LAYCAN: 20-30TH,SEP
COMM:2.5%
PART CARGO, TCT OK
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
VESSEL: MV LILY RISING
MES 56, 2007 BUILT
LOA / LBP: ABT. 189.99 / 182.00 M
BEAM: ABT. 32.26 M DEPTH: ABT. 17.90 M
GRT: ABT. 31,236 NRT: ABT. 18,504
DEADWEIGHT (SCANTLING DRAFT): ABT. 56,083 MT ON 12.573 M DRAFT
T.P.C ON SUMMER FREEBOARD: ABT 55.8 MT
HOLD CUBIC (PRELIMINARY):
GRAIN BALE
NO.1 HOLD 12,713.5 M3 12,132.0 M3
NO.2 HOLD 14,709.8 M3 14,090.0 M3
NO.3 HOLD 14,652.0 M3 14,050.7 M3
NO.4 HOLD 14,709.8 M3 14,090.0 M3
NO.5 HOLD 14,025.6 M3 13,720.8 M3
TOTAL 70,810.7 M3 68,083.5 M3
HATCH COVER: ELECTRO-HYDRAULIC DRIVEN HATCH COVER, FOLDING TYPE FORE/AFT.
CRANES: 4 X ABOUT 30 MT (ABT. 294 KN) X 26 M RADIUS,
GRAB MODE: 4X ABOUT 24TON (ABT 235.2KN) X26M RADIUS
– OUTREACH FROM SHIPRAIL 9.87 M UNDER NORMAL WORKING CONDITION,
HOISTING SPEED 30TX18.5 M/MN
CO2 FITTED:NA
SERVICE SPEED:
SPEED AND CONSUMPTION:
IN GOOD WEATHER CONDITION I.E. IN WINDS UP TO and incl BEAUFORT FORCE 4 AND HEIGHT OF SWELL UP TO and incl DOUGLAS SCALE 3.
BUNKER GRADE IFO (IF-380CST) ISO 8217 RMG35 AND LS-MGO(Max Sulphur 0.1%).
VESSEL ENTITLES TO USE MORE LS-MGO AT NARROW / SHALLOW / BUSY WATER AREA, CANALS, IN AND OUT OF PORTS AND ENGINE STARTING / STOPPING.
AFTER NEW EEXI REGULATION FULL SPEED/CONSUMPTION  (INCLUDING AUX)
BALLAST  ABT 13.4 KNOTS  ON ABT 29.0 MTS VLSFO (380CST)+0.2MT MDO
LADEN   ABT 12.5 KNOTS  ON ABT 29.0 MTS VLSFO(380CST)+0.2MT MDO
ECO SPEED/CONSUMPTION  (INCLUDING AUX)
BALLAST ABT 12.3 KNOTS  ON ABT 23.2 MTS VLSFO(380CST)+0.2MT MDO
LADEN   ABT 11.3KNOTS  ON ABT 23.2 MTS VLSFO(380CST)+0.2MT MDO
IN PORT CONSUMPTION:
WHEN IDLE: ABOUT 2.8MT IFO + ABOUT 0.3MT LSMGO
WHEN WORKING (24 HOURS): ABOUT 4.8MT IFO + ABOUT 0.6MT LSMGO
TKS AND BEST REGARDS!
Warren Gao
AS AGENT ONLY
TEL&WHATSAPP:+8618516690500
QQ& WECHAT:244167672
SKYPE: ORIENTASIALONG
